name: Stellar Bewitching Remastered
storyline: In the Galaxy of Xerxes, Year 212 A.XW. (After Xerian War), parallel to the events of "Rave Heart." A teenage farian girl named Elya Seres residing in Crasper City, Planet Kardel, is troubled for Venusia's Day, the day of love and romance. The pressure of her friends asking her why she's still single all this time has pushed her to ask for her slime familiar's help to get her a boyfriend. Her familiar Floryn, however, has different ideas on how they can get Elya her boyfriend for Venusia's Day. A roller coaster ride of an adventure to the Limbo Realm. Will Elya be able to find a guy to show off for Venusia's day to her friends, will she forever live in the reality that she will remain a single loser in front of her friends for Venusia's day?
summary: A Remastered version of the game "Stellar Bewitching!" With brand new character redesigns and art done by Berry B! A Sci-Fi turn-based RPG that takes place parallel to the events of Rave Heart. Featuring teenage drama, touching storylines, and boss battles the likes of which will test your turn-based knowledge!
